entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
